intro.content:
Welcome DIAN Study staff, coordinators, and PIâ€™s.

This section encompasses study specific tools for your reference. If you have any questions, comments, or new ideas please contact NCRAD by email or phone (800)526-2839.

General questions about the study, not related to the specimens should be directed to the DIAN website or contact the DIAN Global Coordinator at (314)286-2683.

resources.title: Biological Sample Form
resources.content:
The biological sample form is maintained in the DIAN EDC on the ADCS website.

We respectfully ask that all completed forms be emailed (alzstudy@iu.edu) or faxed (317-321-2003) prior to shipment. We also ask that all shipments include a hard copy of each sample form.

actions.text: Please log-in here to access the document.

resources.title: Study Related Video Tutorials
resources.content: Take the guesswork out of it. Watch our video tutorials to learn all of the ins and outs of the process.
